list-item.p: To assess post-vaccination control of viremia by vaccine dose on samples collected at baseline, and on days 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 10 after vaccination.
To determine the change in T and B cell immune responses between baseline and days 10 and 28 post-vaccination.
To measure neutralising antibody to other flaviviruses (including dengue, West Nile and zika viruses) on the baseline sample and determine the impact of these antibodies on YF vaccine immunogenicity.
To determine the change in serum cytokine and chemokine levels between baseline and days 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 10 and 28 post-vaccination.
To determine the change in serum cytokine and chemokine levels between baseline and days 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 10 and 28 post-vaccination.
